TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathMessageFilterElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class XPathMessageFilterElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示在訊息記錄中使用的組態項目。

span.span: Represents a configuration element that is used in message logging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 篩選條件是 XML 文件上由 XPath 1.0 運算式定義的查詢。An XPath filter is a query on an XML document defined by an XPath 1.0 expression. XPath 篩選條件可以加入至 `messageLogging` 區段，以記錄傳輸和服務層級的特定訊息。XPath filters can be added to the `messageLogging` section to log specific messages at the transport and service levels. 如果沒有定義篩選條件，便會記錄所有的訊息。If no filters are defined, all messages are logged. 篩選條件只會套用於訊息的標頭。Filters are applied only to the headers of the message. 本文會被忽略。The body is ignored. [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會忽略訊息本文以增進效能。 ignores the message body to improve performance. 如果您希望根據本文的內容進行篩選，可以使用執行這項工作的篩選條件來建立自訂接聽程式。If you want to filter based on the content of the body, you can create a custom listener with a filter that does so. 當啟用傳輸訊息記錄時 ( 是 `true`)，只會記錄符合篩選條件的訊息。When transport message logging is enabled ( is `true`), only messages matching the filters are logged.
